text: Girl Talk is an album by American jazz organist Shirley Scott recorded in 1967 for the Impulse! label.Impulse! Records discography accessed April 1, 2011 ==Reception== The Allmusic review by Michael G. Nastos awarded the album 3 stars calling it "A bit sweet".Nastos, M. G. Allmusic Review accessed April 1, 2011 ==Track listing== # "Girl Talk" (Neil Hefti, Bobby Troup) - 4:55 # "Come Back To Me" (Burton Lane, Alan Jay Lerner) - 3:07 # "We'll Be Together Again" (Carl Fischer, Frankie Laine) - 3:40 # "Love Nest" (Louis Hirsch, Otto Harbach) - 3:13 # "Swingin' the Blues" (Count Basie, Ed Durham) - 3:55 # "Keep The Faith, Baby" (Shirley Scott) - 3:45 # "Chicago, My Kind of Town" (Jimmy Van Heusen, Sammy Cahn) - 4:45 # "On The Trail (From "Grand Canyon Suite")" (Ferde Grofé) - 3:42 # "You're A Sweetheart" (Jimmy McHugh, Harold Adamson) - 3:30 :*Recorded at Capitol Studios in New York City on January 12, 1967 (tracks 2, 3, 5 & 8) and August 22, 1966 (tracks 1, 4, 6 & 7) ==Personnel== *Shirley Scott -- organ *George Duvivier - bass *Mickey Roker - drums ==References== Category:Impulse! Records albums Category:Shirley Scott albums Category:1967 albums Category:Albums produced by Bob Thiele
title: Girl Talk (Shirley Scott album)
